entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [AOT publish error] EXEC : error : Arithmetic operation resulted in an overflow. #97235
  • Process Start method behaving differently #97233
  • Assertion failed 'this->Prev()->KindIs(BBJ_CALLFINALLY)' #97231
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: The MemoryMarshal cast must support nullable types #97230
  • Add missing GC and Threads performance counters in Net-6 #97229
  • Emulated x86 and x64 .NET 8 on AARCH64 can't restore project #97228
  • JsonSerializer.Serialize produces invalid JSON for [JsonExtensionData] property #97225
    Future
  • [mono][tvos] `System.Linq.Tests` crashing in `mono_gc_wbarrier_value_copy_internal` #97224
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Obsolete all Rfc2898DeriveBytes constructors #97221
  • [browser][AOT] convert the LLVM value V to DTYPE #97217
    9.0.0
  • [Build] Console output lost #97211
  • [Android] Application crashes when an exception is thrown after running a System.Diagnostics.Process #97209
    9.0.0
  • Suggestion: Runtime support for faster BigInteger #97199
  • [Blazor] Unable to debug in lazy loaded assemblies with remote authentication failed #97198
  • [API Proposal]: Asynchronous memory operation APIs for future hardware offloading and acceleration #97194
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives operations that are currently scalar only #97193
    9.0.0
  • TensorPrimitives.IndexOfXx methods sometimes return the wrong index in the face of equality #97190

Closed

  • CheckInterfaces is too permissive and not permissive enough #96436
    9.0.0
  • Profiled casts: isinst is no longer hoisted #96837
    9.0.0
  • crashinfounix.cpp: unknown type name 'off64_t' on Alpine Linux #84665
    9.0.0
  • PublishAot doesn't respect TreatWarningsAsErrors #94178
    9.0.0
  • [Fuzzlyn] Assertion failed 'tgtIG' during 'Generate code' #96224
    9.0.0
  • [JIT] PerfScore includes code size impact? #96878
    9.0.0
  • Enable EVEX embedded rounding support in xarch emitter #93154
    9.0.0
  • IL3050 IL2026 analyzers ignores EnableConfigurationBindingGenerator property #97204
  • OpenSslCachedSystemStoreProvider DER loading does not work #97001
    9.0.0
  • Large MacOS deployed size with NativeAOT including large __LINKEDIT file #96997
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] legacy JS interop needs GC boundaries on main thread too #90044
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: _ParallelCrashTester::ParallelCrashTester.ParallelCrashMainThread() #94652
  • Executing http request in node-wasm does not work anymore #96210
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json - Allow Deserialisation to set properties with private setters without polluting domain objects with deserialisation attributes #97206
  • Run single test using docker image #95436
    9.0.0
  • System.NotImplementedException:: ILCompiler.DependencyAnalysis.ReadyToRunHelperNode.EmitInlineTLSAccess #97168
  • Assert failure: orObject->HasEmptySyncBlockInfo() #96790
    9.0.0
  • Undefined behavior should not be invoked when a ComObject marshaled by UniqueComInterfaceMarshaller<T> is used after calling FinalRelease #96901
    9.0.0
  • Replace DOS stub due to potential copyright issue #97048

PullRequests

Created

  • Late cast expansion: castclass #97237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid deadlocks in TypeDescriptor #97236
    area-System.ComponentModel, 9.0.0
  • Late cast expansion: remove the null check if possible #97234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove old loop code #97232
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add an internal mode to `Lock` to have it use non-alertable waits #97227
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [Mono]: Add "driver" support to Mono AOT cross compiler. #97226
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add Arm64 encoding for IF_SVE_BL_1A #97223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove Compiler::fgIsBetterFallThrough #97222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix: update README.md #97219
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97216
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [browser] Fix debugger support #97213
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Create directory for Binding Tools For Swift #97208
    area-Meta
  • Get rid of `EETypePtr` #97207
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Convert Array.CopySlow to managed #97202
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Type.GetHashCode for RuntimeTypes w/o MethodTable #97195
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add lots more TensorPrimitives operations #97192
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Remove Compiler::fgConnectFallThrough and BBJ_COND fix-ups in loop phases #97191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Reenable branch optimizations when running with llvm. #97189
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] EventPipe: Don't clean up thread list on shutdown #97188
    area-Tracing-coreclr

Merged

  • Implement remaining unimplemented APIs for Builder types #96805
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Limit `PNSE` by using Invariant `HashCode` in `HybridGlobalization` #96354
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • JIT: Late expansion for casts #97075
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Allow compacting loop header blocks #97205
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT implement warning as errors as a compiler feature #96567
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix phase order problem with throw helper blocks #97201
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: remove size contribution to perf score #97069
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove xunit-specific Rosyln analyzer testing packages #97220
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [NativeAOT] Linux/ARM bring-up (3/n) #97104
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • runtime: minor bugs fixed in coreclr and libraries #97155
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Move ComLibrary test projects for host tests to pre-built assets #97185
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Rewind the BIO before attempting to re-process as DER #97003
    area-System.Security
  • Use insGetPredicateType for SVE encodings #97142
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [browser] remove legacy js interop #96841
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update HP libunwind to v1.8.0 #96969
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update README.md and replace .NET Cores with .NET #97197
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Disable dump creation for ParallelCrashTester child #97095
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add note about docker in the testing doc (fix #95436) #95557
    documentation, area-Meta, community-contribution
  • JIT: Compact newly recognized loops #97149
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] [tests] Set error for mono_fullaot runtime tests when no suitable tests are found #96902
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Use whole assembly name when looking for already loaded assemblies #97144
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.3
  • Update eng/common files manually to latest without Arcade itself #97167
    area-Infrastructure
  • NativeAOT: Ignore preferSize and always expand TLS #97187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding vectorized implementations of Exp to Vector64/128/256/512 #97114
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Ensure syncblock is cleared with GC_ALLOC_ZEROING_OPTIONAL #97174
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add ContainsAny{Except} path to SearchValues #96924
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Use ParallelTheory attribute to run cases in parallel #97111
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement
  • Make multiple calls to FinalRelease safe #97059
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Initialize nextRefPosition #97169
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_ED_1A, IF_SVE_EE_1A, IF_SVE_EB_1A, IF_SVE_EC_1A #97238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Parse CallConvSwift in CoreCLR/NativeAOT and block struct types #96707
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add public APIs for persisted AssemblyBulder #97177
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #97072
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Frozen objects should be identified as Gen2 in the handle table #97109
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add SSA transformation and SSA based optimization #96315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix computing available memory on OSX for GC #97102
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • X86 unix fixes #97089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Experiment: Optimize lsra when enregisterLocalVars is false #96386
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • breaking a string on many lines produce incorrect result if followed by a call #96948
    area-System.CodeDom, community-contribution
  • Add TextWriter.CreateBroadcasting #96732
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Stop tracking `genReturnBB` after global morph #97130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] Use auto thread dispatch in HTTP #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Enable Windows runs of AddressSanitizer #95758
    area-Infrastructure
  • TryAddEnumerable test avoid false negatives #96871
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Remove some timeouts and reorganize tests #97115
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Do not throw in AssemblyExtensions.TryGetRawMetadata. #96370
    area-System.Reflection, runtime-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0][mono][debugger] Debugger improvements on .net8 #97160
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • [wasm][mt] throw from blocking wait on JS interop threads #97052
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_JD_4A` to `SVE_JN_3B` #97129
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Bridging generic constraints doc #97084
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Skip `BBJ_CALLFINALLYRET` in `BasicBlock::VisitEHSuccs` #97184
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Test HalfTest: fixed payload preservation testcase for RISC-V #96888
    community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label
  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0][browser] BrowserWebSocket.ReceiveAsync after server initiated close #97002
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.3
  • Add TaskCompletionSource.SetFromTask #97077
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [QUIC] Call silent shutdown in case `CloseAsync` failed. #96807
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Establish loop invariant base case based on IR #97182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Code coverage for Server-side OCSP stapling #97099
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [RISC-V] Update TODOs for RiscV64 Machine and Architecture in Crossgen2 #97021
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wip][browser] Refactor AssertFilesOnDisk function to check subset of files #97031
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [RISC-V] Enable R2RDump #97156
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Don't copy runner to test output during regular builds #96826
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
